title: What a great update!
body: Wtf i cant enter the game at all. My screen goes blank and just say sync out of range even do my resolution is 1024x760 i even swaped it to original trough file to 1280x1024 and i still keep getting the sam message i switched acc with diffrent settings and resolution (1024x760) and i still keep getting the sync. out of range. nice update gj!

replies.body:
This is a live issue currently being updated on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  I don't have any news on a fix right now, but there are two workarounds you can try in the meantime:

- Press "Alt+Enter" together when on the black screen

- Or log in to League of Legends
Browse to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config and open "Game.cfg" in notepad or any other text editor
Find this line: WindowMode=X
Change the "X" to 2. IE: WindowMode=2
Save this, then launch a custom game

Either of those should get your screen restored!

Soon it'll be 24 hours from the beginning of the bug ;) they'll delete ur discussion or post a "click alt+enter , we know that its completely unplayable that way but hey you can see a screen as big as our dicks in the cold and if you play you'll get frustrated but just wait ;)"
a company as big as riot cant fix a bug that they made themselves ? Are monkeys working at there wth?
